summary:
Descriptions:

Forge The Captain\'s Sheild and become Captian Dovahkiin, Skyrim\'s First Avenger.
descriptionHtml:
Descriptions:

Forge The Captain\'s Sheild and become Captian Dovahkiin, Skyrim\'s First Avenger.
The Captain\'s Sheild requires the steel armor crafting perk. 


Also available on the Steam Workshop



Check out my other mods

The Dark Knight
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=88139522
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22005


I hope this mod may inspire other perhaps create other skyrimesque super hero armors
author: UNSCSpartin
